host_environment.name: GitJoker-C2
host_environment.role: Reference implementation and operational environment for IPR issuance and management

purpose.positioning: Technical standard candidate for digital responsibility and cybersecurity

core_principles.decision: Every operational action originates from an explicit decision
core_principles.cost: Every decision implies an irreversible cost
core_principles.trace: Every action produces a verifiable trace
core_principles.time: Every record is exposed to temporal verification and decay

technical_properties.non_repudiation: Anchored evidence prevents denial of issued records

interoperability.cybersecurity_act: Provides technical evidence for responsibility chains

legal_nature.legal_effect: Chronological and identity evidence under EU law

lifecycle.issuance: Manual or assisted via AIJOKER-C2 hosted in GitJoker-C2
lifecycle.decay: Possible if traceability conditions are not met
